特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
IMPORTANT NOTICE: This course is conducted in lecture format. Please note the following in light of the ongoing pandemic: assignments will be posted on LUNA throughout the term, along with important announcements about the course -- including which lectures are in person and which are online -- and so it is critical that students log in to LUNA regularly during this course.

* The first three lectures of this course will be offered on-demand. After the course registration is finalized, students will be notified of the course implementation format for the remaining eleven weeks.*

第1回:
April 14: Introduction: Course Overview, Key Concepts
No Assignment Due
第2回:
April 21: Ancient Greece: The Rise and Fall of Athens
No Assignment Due
第3回:
April 28: Rome’s Shadow: The Legacy of Ancient Rome in Europe
No Assignment Due
Reading Assignment: de Soete pp. 87-104 (for your reference, see also: Cole and Symes 156-171).
第4回:
May 12: The Rise of the Holy Roman Empire
Written Response #1 Due
Reading assignment from the Cole & Symes textbook, details provided in the weekly assignment (posted on LUNA).
第5回:
May 19: The Hundred Years War: The Rise of Nationalism in Europe
Written Response #2 Due
Reading assignment from the Cole & Symes textbook, details provided in the weekly assignment (posted on LUNA).
第6回:
May 26: Westphalia: The Development of the Nation-State
Written Response #3 Due
Reading assignment from the Cole & Symes textbook, details provided in the weekly assignment (posted on LUNA).
第7回:
June 2: The New World: European Competition in the Americas
Written Response #4 Due
Reading assignment from the Cole & Symes textbook, details provided in the weekly assignment (posted on LUNA).
第8回:
June 9: The Napoleonic Wars: Balance of Power
Written Response #5 Due
Reading assignment from the Cole & Symes textbook, details provided in the weekly assignment (posted on LUNA).
第9回:
June 16: Pax Britannica: British Hegemony in the 19th Century
Written Response #6 Due
Reading assignment from the Cole & Symes textbook, details provided in the weekly assignment (posted on LUNA).
第10回:
June 23: World War I: The Transformation of European Relations
No Assignment Due
Reading assignment from the Cole & Symes textbook, details provided in the weekly assignment (posted on LUNA).
第11回:
June 30: World War II: The Decline of European Power
No Assignment Due
Reading assignment from the Cole & Symes textbook, details provided on LUNA.
第12回:
July 17: The Cold War: Europe in the Shadow of America and Russia
Final Research Paper Due
Reading assignment from the Cole & Symes textbook, details provided on LUNA.
第13回:
July 14: The Development of the Realist Paradigm
No Assignment Due
Reading assignment from the Cole & Symes textbook, details provided on LUNA.
第14回:
July 21: Challenges to the Realist Paradigm
No Assignment Due

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Guidelines for the final paper will be provided on Luna during the term
成績評価Grading2: Weekly short assignments based on lectures and reading assignments

name: 【320】International Relations in Europe　１／International Relations in Europe [EN]
担当者: デソーテ　フランソワ（DE SOETE FRANCOIS）
